src:
PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA (ponedeljak): Jurimo golove u Ferari, Stouku, Bohumu i Moskvi, a cvikamo od Lisabona
Pročitajte nekoliko predloga za 4. novembar

04 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA novinari portala MOZZART Sport iznose svoje mišljenje povodom utakmica koje se igraju tog dana, i daju svoje viđenje koji bi ishod mogao da bude postignut na određenim parovima.
Šta vi mislite? Imate li svoje ideje, predloge, fikseve... koje biste podelili s drugima?
Ostavite komentar ispod teksta...
Fiksevi dana
ITALIJA 1 ID: 4488778
20:45 | Spal - Sampdoria
Samp je primio najmanje po dva gola na devet od poslednjih 10 gostovanja u Seriji A, a na poslednja četiri odmeravanja u svim takmičenjima sa ovim pritivnikom došlo je 3+.
Ukupno golova: 2+Kvota: 1.35Fiksevi dana
ENGLESKA 2 ID: 4489585
21:00 | Stoke - WBA
Na šest od poslednjih sedam mečeva u svim takmičenjima u kojima je Stouk dočekao Brom došlo je 0-2 gola. Takođe na poslednji pet gostovanja VBA u Čempionšipu takođe je došlo 0-2.
Ukupno golova: 0-2Kvota: 1.76Fiksevi dana
TURSKA 1 ID: 4488591
18:00 | Ankaragucu - Gazisehir Gaziantep
Iako je pri dnu tabele tim iz turske prestonice je veoma tvrd domaćin koji retko dozvoljava gostima da odnesu ceo plen. Ovu tvrdnju dokazuje statistička činjenica koja kaže da je Ankaraguču doživeo samo jedan poraz na poslednjih 11 utakmica na svom stadionu u Superligu.
Dupla šansa: 1XKvota: 1.56Fiksevi dana
NEMAČKA 2 ID: 4489576
20:30 | Bochum - Nurnberg
Bohum, koji je u seriji od šest nerešenih susreta na domaćem terenu u Cvajti, primio je najmanje po dva gola na poslednjih osam mečeva na svom stadionu, na kojima je pritom došlo UG 3+. U Bundesligi II, naravno.
Ukupno golova: 3+Kvota: 1.5Vredi probati
ARGENTINA 1 ID: 4493691
23:00 | Defensa Justicia - Argentinos Juniors
Argentinosi su treći na tabeli, a njihovi domaćini 17. Defensa nije uspela da postigne pogodak na poslednjih pet domaćinstava u Argentini 1, a Huniorsi su slavili na šest obračuna u poslednjih sedam kola.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 3.7Vredi probati
RUSIJA 1 ID: 4489542
17:00 | Spartak Moscow - Arsenal Tula
Spartak je postigao najmanje po dva gola na poslednja četiri meča na kojima je dočekao goste iz Tule u svim takmičenjima. Takođe, Arsenal nije uspeo da pobedi na poslednjih sedam susreta u ruskoj Premijer ligi.
Mozzart kombinazzije: 1&2+Kvota: 2.15Za izbegavanje
PORTUGALIJA 1 ID: 4488567
20:00 | Belenenses - Ferreira
Jeste da Pakoš nije izgubio od Belenensesa na poslednjih 15 odmeravanja, ali je na poslednjih sedam gostovanja u Primeiri doživeo šest poraza. Takođe, na dva od poslednja tri duela ova dva tima nije bilo pobednika. Zato bismo izbegli sudar u Belemu, jednom od delova Lisabona.
Konačan ishod: 2Kvota: 2.9
text:
SUGGESTIONS AND TIPPING (Monday): We are chasing goals in Ferrari, Stoke, Bochum and Moscow, and we are screaming from Lisbon
Read some suggestions for November 4th

04 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section, MOZZART Sport reporters give their opinions on the matches played that day, and give their views on what outcome could be achieved in certain pairs.
What do you think? Do you have any ideas, suggestions, fixes ... to share with others?
Leave a comment below ...
Fixes of the day
ITALY 1 ID: 4488778
20:45 | Spal - Sampdoria
Samp has conceded at least two goals in nine of his last 10 appearances in Serie A, and has scored 3+ in his last four appearances in all competitions with this fielder.
Total Goals: 2 + Odds: 1.35Fixed Days
ENGLISH 2 ID: 4489585
21:00 | Stoke - WBA
There have been 0-2 goals in six of the last seven matches in all competitions in which Stoke welcomed Brom. Also in the last five WBA Championship appearances in the Championship also went 0-2.
Total Goals: 0-2Quotes: 1.76Fixed Days
TURKEY 1 ID: 4488591
18:00 | Ankaragucu - Gazisehir Gaziantep
Although at the bottom of the table, the team from the Turkish capital is a very tough host who rarely allows guests to carry away their loot. This claim is proven by the statistical fact that says that Ankaragucu has suffered only one defeat in their last 11 games at their Superliga stadium.
Double Chance: 1XQuotes: 1.56Fixed Days
GERMANY 2 ID: 4489576
20:30 | Bochum - Nuremberg
Bochum, who has been in a series of six draws at home in Zweite, has scored at least two goals in his last eight matches at his stadium, which saw UG 3+. In Bundesliga II, of course.
Total Goals: 3 + Odds: 1.5Worth to try
ARGENTINA 1 ID: 4493691
23:00 | Defensa Justicia - Argentinos Juniors
The Argentinos are third on the table, with their 17th Defensive hosts failing to score on the last five home runs in Argentina 1, with the Juniors celebrating on six clearances in the last seven rounds.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 3.7Worth to try
RUSSIA 1 ID: 4489542
17:00 | Spartak Moscow - Arsenal Tula
Spartak have scored at least two goals in their last four matches, which has welcomed guests from Tula in all competitions. Also, Arsenal have failed to win their last seven matches in the Russian Premier League.
Mozzart Combos: 1 & 2 + Odds: 2.15To avoid
PORTUGAL 1 ID: 4488567
20:00 | Belenenses - Ferreira
Yes, Pakoš has not lost to Belenenses in his last 15 appearances, but has suffered six defeats in Primeira's last seven appearances. Also, there have been no winners in two of the last three duels of these two teams. That is why we avoid a collision in Belem, one of the parts of Lisbon.
Final Outcome: 2Quotes: 2.9
